actions: Clears Heat and reduces Fire toxicity.
Drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
Drains Fire and resolves Fire toxicity.
With Huang Qin, Huang Bai and Da Huang, for abscesses, lesions, carbuncles, furuncles, burns, swelling and inflammation due to toxic Heat.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire and detoxifies.
With Huang Lian and Huang Bai, topically for lesions and sores with redness, swelling and pain.

symptoms: Boils occur around the face, head, neck and hips
At the onset, they may be hard nodes
Later the may become soft with a whitish-yellowish exudate
A suppurating in-sized lesion may appear at the top
The adjacent lymph nodes may be enlarged

notes: Grind equal parts of the ingredients into a fine powder, mix with warm, boiled water or honey and apply to the lesion.
